# notifications

Manage Coder notifications

Aliases:

- notification

## Usage

```console
coder notifications
```

## Description

```console
Administrators can use these commands to change notification settings.
  - Pause Coder notifications:

     $ coder notifications pause

  - Unpause Coder notifications:

     $ coder notifications unpause
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                               | Purpose               |
| -------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| [<code>pause</code>](./notifications_pause.md)     | Pause notifications   |
| [<code>unpause</code>](./notifications_unpause.md) | Unpause notifications |
